summary: Tanssi is a decentralized infrastructure protocol designed to enable the rapid deployment of sovereign appchains.

optional_resources.title: Tanssi Foundation Grants Application
optional_resources.description: The Tanssi Grants Program supports teams building decentralized networks and tools using Tanssi infrastructure and Symbiotic restaked security.
